subject: Dear Kenneth
body:
EQUITY INVESTMENT LIMITED.
TEL:+447452219067
Fax:+447452232010
Date: 12/02/2024

Dear Kenneth,


Who are you. Kindly forward your award certificate so that we verify you.


ERIC PAUL

subject: Re: Dear Kenneth
body:
Dear Eric Paul,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize for any confusion, but I'm not sure what award you are referring to. Could you please provide more details about the award and how it is related to Equity Investment Limited? I would be happy to assist you further once I have a better understanding of the situation.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Dear Kenneth
body:
Dear Kenneth,

You sent me an email stating you want  information regarding our
banking details regarding Affidavit T21.

Kindly send all information and documents you received from us so that I verify.
Kindly study the mail below.

Regards,

ERIC PAUL



Dear Eric Paul,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message regarding
the equity investment limited and the bank accounts you provided.
Could you please provide me with more information about the affidavit
fee? What is it for exactly, and how much is required?

I want to make sure I understand the process correctly before
proceeding. Additionally, could you please clarify what award prize
you are referring to? I'm sorry if there has been any confusion on my
part.

Looking forward to your response.
Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: Dear Kenneth
body:
Dear Kenneth,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your interest in our banking details and the Affidavit. The Affidavit is a legal document that verifies the authenticity of certain information or claims. In this case, it is required to ensure the smooth transfer of funds to your account.

Regarding the fee for the Affidavit, it covers administrative and legal expenses involved in processing and verifying the necessary documents. The exact amount will depend on various factors, such as the total sum being transferred and any applicable taxes or fees.

As for the award prize, it refers to a promotional offer we have running currently. If you provide me with some more information about yourself, I can check if you are eligible for this prize. However, please note that claiming the prize may require fulfilling certain conditions or paying additional fees.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to ask. I'm here to assist you.

Best wishes,
Kenneth
